participant_1.name: Amanda
participant_1.personality: Caring and enthusiastic, Amanda finds joy in teaching and cherishes her time with students.
participant_1.background: My students are my favorite people because they make me laugh and smile every day. I love the suburbs because I have more space for my family and our movie collection. I use my laptop to work on lessons while I'm at the park. I love to spend time with my cat, especially when I'm feeling stressed from school.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and thoughtful, Jordan is eager to explore his options and make a positive impact in the business world.
participant_2.background: I'm proud of my sister and her growing family. My family members are all very supportive of my interests and always encourage me to explore new things. I'm doing well in school, but I wish the weather was warmer. I am saving money to buy my first car. I spend too much time watching my favorite television shows.

content.text: Hello! I am a teacher and I love my students.  What do you do for a living?
Hi! I am a college student and I am working toward my degree in business.
That is awesome! What do you want to do with your business degree?
I am not sure yet. I am thinking about starting my own business or working for a large corporation.
That sounds like a great plan! I am sure you will be successful.
I am from the suburbs of Chicago.  How about you?
I live in the suburbs of Chicago as well.
That is awesome!  We should go out for coffee sometime and talk about our jobs.
That sounds like a great idea!
Great! I will text you my number.
Sounds good!  I look forward to meeting you.
